title: Holoride’s in-car VR tech is coming to Audi this summer - TechCrunch
content: Holoride’s in-car VR tech is coming to Audi this summer  TechCrunch
description: Virtual reality is about to launch in series production cars this summer, starting with Audi sedans and SUVs. Holoride announced Saturday at the SXSW tech, music and film conference in Austin that its headset-based virtual-reality entertainment system will debut in June in certain Audi models with …
